name: Driving School parking 2018
description:
Let's Learn driving and Parking From Driving School
How good you are in CAR PARKING? Let's Test Your Driving Skills while Driving In a Driving School
Popularly also known as DRIVING SCHOOL Test!
Driving School is the latest Parking game where you can learn to drive different kind of vehicles. Driving School will allow you to play across many environments.
It’s the Big Day! Are you all set to get your driving license today from this DRIVING SCHOOL?
Take charge of the car and brush up the road rules. Master those tricky parking spots – between two vehicles, reverse parking, garage parking, HARD PARKING etc. Can you impress the driving instructor with your DRIVING SKILLS and earn your license to freedom?

Driving School Features and Rules: 
- Many awesome cars to drive in.
- Smooth and realistic car handling
- Exciting levels to play. 
- Realistic weather condition in CITY DRIVING
- Explore the beauty of big cities in the Free Drive mode. become a CITY DRIVER and Enjoy Car Parking
- Enjoy the realistic driving mechanics. 
- Experience real life driving tests.

Download This Amazing CAR PARKING GAME... Have Fun with CAR DRIVING... and get a license from DRIVING SCHOOL with Full of DRIVING SKILLS.
